description: This file defines the `FilterProvider` class in Dart, which manages filter criteria for a Flutter application. It provides methods to update different parts of the filter, toggle selections, reset to default values, and notify listeners of changes.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages filter criteria state and notifies listeners upon changes.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Replaces the current filter criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: toggleHairColor
methods.description: Toggles a hair color selection in the filter criteria.

methods.name: toggleReligion
methods.description: Toggles a religion selection in the filter criteria.

methods.name: toggleEthnicity
methods.description: Toggles an ethnicity selection in the filter criteria.

methods.name: updateHeightRange
methods.description: Updates the minimum and maximum height criteria.

methods.name: updateWeightRange
methods.description: Updates the minimum and maximum weight criteria.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets filter criteria to their default values.

methods.name: apply
methods.description: Triggers an application of the current filter criteria, notifying listeners.
